main event: On January 6, 1959, an unidentified flying object was observed hovering in the air near Clines Corner and Albuquerque, New Mexico.
interesting points: The object was described as exceptionally brilliant, changing colors from cold green to blue and orange., The observer noted it could have been aircraft dropping flares or balloons., The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes., The size of the object was compared to that of a grapefruit with lights flaring from its tail end., Five witnesses, including two children, observed the object during its flight.
